title: Simulation Training for Secondary Music Instructional Design Integrating Information Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A professional competency development course for pre-service and in-service teachers, enabling the implementation of real educational scenarios in VR-based virtual classrooms

learning_goals: Participants can execute three or more information technology-based music lesson designs using VR simulations.
Participants can provide feedback on students' musical works with 80% accuracy using AI audio analysis tools.
Participants can demonstrate the process of creating and sharing music education content on an LMS platform.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
